I have a strong interest in teaching mathematics, (bio)statistics and data science. Below is a list of the courses and modules I have lectured or tutored. 

---------------------------------------------------------

### Short Courses/ Workshops

* **UTS 2024**: I delivered a one-day workshop on Functional Data Analysis for Sports Biomechanics at the [School of Sport, Exercise and Rehabilitation](https://www.uts.edu.au/about/faculty-health/school-sport-exercise-and-rehabilitation) in the University of Technology Sydney (UTS). The materials are available at our [workshop website](https://github.com/edwardgunning/UTS-FDA-Short-Course).

![Delivering the workshop at UTS.](uts-course.JPG)

* [**ISBS 2024**](https://www.isbs2024.com/): On July $15$th $2024$, I delivered a pre-conference workshop on **Functional Data Analysis in Sports Biomechanics** at [ISBS 2024](https://www.isbs2024.com/) on in Salzburg with Prof. Drew Harrison. The materials are available at our [workshop website](https://github.com/edwardgunning/ISBS-Short-Course).

![Drew and I delivering our workshop at ISBS.](isbs-course.png)
